  • Constructor Details

    • PatternContentValidator

      public PatternContentValidator(String allowedCharacters, String pattern, boolean matchSubstring)
      Constructs PatternContentValidator with the given params.
      Parameters:
      allowedCharacters - OCR whitelist. Empty string means no restriction. Default is ""
      pattern - Wildcard validation pattern. ? - any character # - any digit all other characters represent themselves
      matchSubstring - Whether the pattern should match the whole string or just a substring Default is false

    • PatternContentValidator

      public PatternContentValidator(String pattern)
      Constructs PatternContentValidator with default parameters. Constructs PatternContentValidator with the given params.
      Parameters:
      pattern - Wildcard validation pattern. ? - any character # - any digit all other characters represent themselves
